entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:41 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow and local blowing snow beginning overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:41 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:41 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
